results.title: Worsening Hypothyroidism in the Setting of New-Onset Nephrotic Syndrome
results.text_hl: Worsening @DISEASE_Hypothyroidism @DISEASE_MESH:D007037 @@@Hypothyroidism@@@ in the Setting of New-Onset @<m>DISEASE_Nephrotic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009404 @@@Nephrotic Syndrome@@@

results.title: Nephrotic Syndrome in a Child With NPHS2 Mutation.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>DISEASE_Nephrotic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009404 @@@Steroid resistant nephrotic syndrome@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Nephrotic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009404 @@@SRNS@@@) accounts for 30% of all cases of @<m>DISEASE_Nephrotic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009404 @@@nephrotic syndrome@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Nephrotic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009404 @@@NS@@@) in children and frequently leads to @DISEASE_Kidney_Failure_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D007676 @@@end stage kidney disease@@@ (@DISEASE_Kidney_Failure_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D007676 @@@ESKD@@@).

citations.NLM: Tollaksen R, Craver RD, Yosypiv IV. Nephrotic Syndrome in a Child With NPHS2 Mutation. Pediatr Dev Pathol. 2024 Jan 30;():10935266231223274. PMID: 38291869
citations.BibTeX: @article{38291869, title={Nephrotic Syndrome in a Child With NPHS2 Mutation.}, author={Tollaksen R and Craver RD and Yosypiv IV}, journal={Pediatr Dev Pathol}, pages={10935266231223274}}

results.title: Nephropathy in a Child with Severe Recessive Dystrophic Epidermolysis Bullosa Treated with Cyclophosphamide: A Case Report
results.text_hl: A presumptive @DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis_IGA @DISEASE_MESH:D005922 @@@IgAN@@@ diagnosis was based on clinical features and increased @GENE_CD79A @GENE_973 @@@IgA@@@ serum levels, as kidney biopsy was refused by his parents. @<m>DISEASE_Nephrotic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009404 @@@Nephrotic@@@-range @DISEASE_Proteinuria @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ persisted despite initial @CHEMICAL_Steroids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013256 @@@steroid@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ treatment.

citations.NLM: Ambarsari CG, Palupi-Baroto R, Sinuraya FAG, Suryati E, Widyastuti E, Widhiati S. Nephropathy in a Child with Severe Recessive Dystrophic Epidermolysis Bullosa Treated with Cyclophosphamide: A Case Report Case Rep Nephrol Dial. 2023 Jan-Dec;13(1):75-83. PMID: 37484797
citations.BibTeX: @article{37484797, title={Nephropathy in a Child with Severe Recessive Dystrophic Epidermolysis Bullosa Treated with Cyclophosphamide: A Case Report}, author={Ambarsari CG and Palupi-Baroto R and Sinuraya FAG and Suryati E and Widyastuti E and Widhiati S}, journal={Case Rep Nephrol Dial}, volume={13}, number={1}, pages={75-83}}

results.title: Additive antiproteinuric effect of the NSAID indomethacin and the ACE inhibitor lisinopril.
results.text_hl: We studied the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Indomethacin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007213 @@@indomethacin@@@ separately and in combination in 10 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with the @<m>DISEASE_Nephrotic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009404 @@@nephrotic syndrome@@@.

citations.NLM: Heeg JE, de Jong PE, Vriesendorp R, de Zeeuw D. Additive antiproteinuric effect of the NSAID indomethacin and the ACE inhibitor lisinopril. Am J Nephrol. 1990;10 Suppl 1():94-7. PMID: 2175149
citations.BibTeX: @article{2175149, title={Additive antiproteinuric effect of the NSAID indomethacin and the ACE inhibitor lisinopril.}, author={Heeg JE and de Jong PE and Vriesendorp R and de Zeeuw D}, journal={Am J Nephrol}, volume={10 Suppl 1}, pages={94-7}}

results.title: Complete remission of non-HIV collapsing glomerulopathy with deflazacort and lisinopril in an adult patient.
results.text_hl: This case report shows the evolution of a 58-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with non-HIV @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Atelectasis @DISEASE_MESH:D001261 @@@idiopathic collapsing glomerulopathy@@@ who presented with severe @<m>DISEASE_Nephrotic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009404 @@@nephrotic syndrome@@@ and @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@renal insufficiency@@@ and was treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_deflazacort @CHEMICAL_MESH:C021988 @@@deflazacort@@@, a synthetic corticosteroid that has shown fewer cosmetic effects and @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ and bone @DISEASE_Metabolic_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008659 @@@metabolism@@@ complications than @CHEMICAL_Prednisone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011241 @@@prednisone@@@.

citations.NLM: Vega J, Guarda FJ, Goecke H, Méndez GP. Complete remission of non-HIV collapsing glomerulopathy with deflazacort and lisinopril in an adult patient. Clin Exp Nephrol. 2010 Aug;14(4):385-8. PMID: 20428916
citations.BibTeX: @article{20428916, title={Complete remission of non-HIV collapsing glomerulopathy with deflazacort and lisinopril in an adult patient.}, author={Vega J and Guarda FJ and Goecke H and Méndez GP}, journal={Clin Exp Nephrol}, volume={14}, number={4}, pages={385-8}}

results.title: Association of nephrotic syndrome with immune reconstitution inflammatory syndrome.
results.text_hl: Treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Nephrotic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009404 @@@nephrotic syndrome@@@ was initiated with @CHEMICAL_Prednisone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011241 @@@prednisone@@@, an angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor (@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@), and @CHEMICAL_Heparin_Low_Molecular_Weight @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006495 @@@low-molecular-weight heparin@@@.

citations.NLM: Lankisch P, Laws HJ, Wingen AM, Borkhardt A, Niehues T, Neubert J. Association of nephrotic syndrome with immune reconstitution inflammatory syndrome. Pediatr Nephrol. 2012 Apr;27(4):667-9. PMID: 22203364
citations.BibTeX: @article{22203364, title={Association of nephrotic syndrome with immune reconstitution inflammatory syndrome.}, author={Lankisch P and Laws HJ and Wingen AM and Borkhardt A and Niehues T and Neubert J}, journal={Pediatr Nephrol}, volume={27}, number={4}, pages={667-9}}

results.title: Comparison of the influence of angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor lisinopril and angiotensin II receptor antagonist losartan in patients with idiopathic membranous nephropathy and nephrotic syndrome.
results.text_hl: Comparison of the influence of @GENE_ACE @GENE_1636 @@@angiotensin-converting enzyme@@@ inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and angiotensin II receptor antagonist @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis_Membranous @DISEASE_MESH:D015433 @@@idiopathic membranous nephropathy@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Nephrotic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009404 @@@nephrotic syndrome@@@.

citations.NLM: Kosmadakis G, Filiopoulos V, Georgoulias C, Tentolouris N, Michail S. results.title: Focal segmental glomerulosclerosis in association with neurofibromatosis type 1: a case report and proposed molecular pathways
results.text_hl: On final dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ 20 mg/day, protein-@CHEMICAL_Creatinine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003404 @@@creatinine@@@ ratio declined to 0.33 within 10 months.

citations.NLM: Afshinnia F, Vega-Warner V, Killen P. Focal segmental glomerulosclerosis in association with neurofibromatosis type 1: a case report and proposed molecular pathways Clin Kidney J. 2013 Apr;6(2):208-210. PMID: 23805377
